channel.title: Most frustratingly difficult games ever?
channel.description:
^ what the title says.
for me it has to be super meat boy, or vvvvvv.

item.title: Most frustratingly difficult games ever?
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Jet Force Gemini was pretty rough to get the final ending, though maybe that’s just because of the age when I played it. Looking back though, I’m surprised that as a kid I had the patience and determination to find and rescue every freaking tribal on every planet. Probably the first game I ever clocked more than 20 hours on one save.

Also, any strategy game on a difficulty above normal or easy. It’s like there’s no way to make the AI moderately progress in difficulty from one difficulty to the next. I’ll play on one difficulty and win easily, so I think, “Oh, that was too easy, I’ll go on to the next difficulty for more of a challenge.” And then I get raped 2 minutes into the game, before I’ve even built a barracks. It also seems like the difficulty increases exponentially with the amount of enemies you have, probably because the computer can efficiently coordinate with itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Most frustratingly difficult games ever?

item.description:
Warcraft 2 1995, non Battle net edition. There are no control groups, and with a massive army you can only select and move 9 guys at a time :fffuuu:

QFT… fucking POS you-only-get-four-hp

item.title: Most frustratingly difficult games ever?
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
F(orum)USER:

Descent 2

on medium difficulty you die a lot with the final boss. go above that and the boss is invincible because of a bug :fffuuu:

QFT.

Doing the hardest difficulty (forgot if it was ACE or HOTSHOT) made the AI avoid EVERY SINGLE PROJECTILE you would throw at them.

It was beyond ridiculous.

item.title: Most frustratingly difficult games ever?
item.dc:creator: Asharil
item.description:
Ikaruga

  1. Black bullets everywhere!
  2. Switch polarity!
  3. WHITE BULLETS COMING IN!
  4. Switch polarity! BOOM Ah… switched too soon.
  5. GOTO 1, surviving 20 seconds longer this time.
    I never progressed beyond stage 3 on that game, on easy.

Alone in the Dark.
Goddamn Central Park driving level. After I finished that sequence I never went back to do it again.

Battletoads.
That freaking level where you have to dodge barriers while flying. Managed to pull it off (on the GameBoy version) once or twice. So frustrating that I never want to do it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Most frustratingly difficult games ever?
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
duh4563:

Trying to defeat the larger bosses in Borderlands by yourself is a pain in the ass.
I honestly thought someone would have pointed this already but maybe i was the only one who played by myself or maybe i just suck.

You just suck. The bosses were a joke. I found 20 guys ganging up on me more dangerous than Sledge or the Rakk hive.

Oh my god

n

How could I forget n in this thread!?

N as in the flash game Ninja? I love that game spent many hours of CAD class in high school playing that (after classwork, of course :-D).

Also yeah Far Cry is pretty tough. Xray vision, super damage (eat through your health and armor in 2 hits), etc. Fun game though.
